scripts.docs:watch: nodemon --watch src --watch backend --watch frontend --watch *.js --ext js --exec 'npm run docs'
scripts.validate:docs: find . -name '*.js' -not -path './node_modules/*' -not -path './admin/cipipeline/docs/*' | xargs grep -l '/\*\*' || echo 'Some files missing JSDoc comments'
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run docs
scripts.ci:check: npm run validate:docs && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run docs
